text:
Bug in HTTPSamplerFull.java at LineNumber 351:
If one Image is twice on this page, this break quits the for loop!. 
All other images on this page dont get downloaded!

Using Jmeter Ver 1.8 with Java 1.4.0_01
creator: hre@ecofinance.com

text: Applied fix suggested by bug submitter.
